alert.note: Alert for Hartford; Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 1:42PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Thunderstorms With Heavy Rain and Minor Flooding Across Portions of Northern Connecticut and Central Massachusetts... At 141 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking several strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Union to Hartford. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Heavy Rainfall and Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Springfield, Hartford, New Britain, West Hartford, Manchester, Chicopee, East Hartford, Enfield, Westfield, Holyoke, Glastonbury, Newington, Vernon, Windsor, Agawam, West Springfield, Wethersfield, Mansfield, and South Windsor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
